data.text: @Jenna_bee__ @Golden_Pup It's unbelievable. There's no science or compassion involved, just needles in arms no matter what the consequences.
@Golden_Pup Seems like the astrazeneca is really bad. Not surprising
@JohnnyCr4sh @RiddochRichard @Golden_Pup ???????? What does that have to do with anything?????????

@StatisticsBC @Golden_Pup That's what's happening. If you don't die, you're expected to come for another one. There's a guy out in BC still waiting for an exemption, which will probably never come, after being completely..Well look at him!
https://t.co/lmXeKMtFHl

@Jenna_bee__ @Golden_Pup In BC there are deferral forms but not really exemptions that I know of. At any rate they should write deferrals. Heard a doctor say that they reported a reaction but then public health called the patient and told them to get a second shot! 

https://t.co/1VKkSoRa16

@Jenna_bee__ @StatisticsBC @Golden_Pup She's negligent in her duty, and you should request her to fill out the form again, and if she refuses report her to the college of physicians for your province, and get a new doctor.
@RiddochRichard @Golden_Pup I can choose not to take Advil and keep my job âœŒ🏼

@Golden_Pup @savyrecords Screen shot from Jessica Rose PhD preso on causation using Bradford HillCritera.Slide points out that there is reproducibility of safety signal- US VAERS, UKYellow Card & EudraVigilance EU,different pharmacovigilance tools- reporting over 1 million AEs.THIS has never happened B4. https://t.co/VLMSSvoXm3
